Title: NELFUND disburses N154.4b loans to 788,947 students in 18 months
Summary: NELFUND disbursed a total of N154.4b loans to 788,947 students in 18 months of operation . The Nigerian Education Loan Fund (NelfUND) disburses a total . of ₦154,373,551,374.00 in interest-free loans .

Title: GAIA AFRICA announces 2025/2026 member season, spotlighting women leaders across the continent
Summary: GAIA AFRICA announces 2025/2026 member season, spotlighting women leaders across the continent . The continent’s premier private members’ club for women leaders, has officially opened its . membership season, inviting a new cohort of visionary African women .

Title: How unwavering commitment to excellence, integrity, mark my entrepreneurial journey, by Bartholomew Egbochie
Summary: Bartholomew Egbochie is the helmsman at ATCO Homes – a fast-rising Nigerian real estate company . His testimonials reveal exceptional integrity, strong accomplishments and widening impact footprint . From selling recharge cards as an undergraduate to building a thriving Oil and Gas company .

Title: Cheating is not a deal breaker, says Toyosi Etim-Effiong
Summary: Toyosi Etim-Effiong said cheating is not a deal breaker for her . She made this known during a Podcast with media personality Toke Makinwa . She spoke about life, spirituality, and marriage .

Title: NMDPRA chief disowns defence circulating online, denies issuing statement
Summary: The Authority Chief Executive of the Nigerian Midstream and Downstream Petroleum Regulatory Authority, Engr Farouk Ahmed, has formally disowned a detailed statement circulating in the public space and attributed to him in response to recent corruption allegations .

Title: S/Africa raids US ‘refugee’ centre, to expel Kenyans working illegally
Summary: US President Donald Trump's administration in May offered refugee status to the minority white Afrikaner community . The Pretoria government strongly denies that the Pretoria-based government denies it .

Title: HashKey debuts on Hong Kong market as city chases global crypto hub status
Summary: HashKey debuts on Hong Kong market as city chases global crypto hub status . Hong Kong's biggest licensed cryptocurrency exchange began trading on Wednesday . City pushes to become global hub for the technology despite Beijing's tough stance on it .

Title: NDLEA secures order to detain vessel, 21 persons over cocaine shipment from Brazil
Summary: NDLEA secures order to detain vessel, 21 persons over cocaine shipment from Brazil . Spokesman of the agency, Femi Babafemi, said the cocaine consignment was discovered on 6th December 2025 .

Title: ‘The best is yet to come’ – Trump to Americans
Summary: US President Donald Trump will boast of his achievements in an address to the nation Wednesday . Voters sour on his handling of the economy after nearly a year back in power .

Title: Breaking: Enugu standstill as NLC protest against insecurity begins
Summary: Nigeria Labour Congress NLC, Enugu chapter, has commenced its planned protest against insecurity in Nigeria . The protest led by the NLC chairman of the state, Comrade Fabian Nwigbo, lamented the level of insecurity in the country .
